sentences.en: After careful deliberation, it was agreed to abandon the project.
sentences.cn: 经过慎重考虑, 大家同意放弃这个项目.

sentences.en: Because of the fog they abandoned their idea of driving.
sentences.cn: 因为有雾，他们打消了开车去的念头。

sentences.en: Do not abandon yourself to despair.
sentences.cn: 不要悲观失望.

sentences.en: Each side declared that it would never abandon its principle.
sentences.cn: 各方都说绝不放弃自己的原则.

sentences.en: He approached life with reckless abandon–I don't think he himself knew what he was going to do next.
sentences.cn: 他以不计后果的放纵态度对待生活–我想他自己都不知道他接下来要做什么。

sentences.en: He has spent money with gay abandon.
sentences.cn: 他肆意挥霍钱财。

sentences.en: How could she abandon her own child?
sentences.cn: 她怎么能抛弃自己的孩子呢？

sentences.en: I decided not to abandon John when he was in such a desperate position.
sentences.cn: 我决定不在约翰走投无路的时候抛弃他。

sentences.en: It would be irresponsible of me not to advise my company to abandon this project.
sentences.cn: 若我不建议公司放弃这个项目，那我就是不负责任。

sentences.en: People were shouting and cheering with abandon.
sentences.cn: 人们兴高采烈,纵情欢呼.

sentences.en: The captain gave the order to abandon ship.
sentences.cn: 船长下令弃船。

sentences.en: The game had to be abandoned due to bad weather.
sentences.cn: 由于天气不好，比赛不得不中止。

sentences.en: The girls jumped up and down and waved their arms with abandon.
sentences.cn: 那些女孩子跳上跳下尽情地挥舞着手臂.

sentences.en: The market might abandon the stock, and knock down its price.
sentences.cn: 市场可能会抛售该股票，从而令其股价下跌。

sentences.en: The officers and crew prepared to abandon ship in an orderly fashion.
sentences.cn: 全体船员秩序井然地准备弃船。

sentences.en: Their decision to abandon the trip was made because of financial constraints.
sentences.cn: 他们决定放弃这次出游是因为财力有限。

sentences.en: Their permissiveness to-ward their children reflects the wild abandon of their own lives.
sentences.cn: 他们对孩子的放任折射出他们自身生活的放浪形骸。

sentences.en: They abandon themselves to drinking.
sentences.cn: 他们沉湎于饮酒.

sentences.en: They abandoned their attempt to recapture the castle.
sentences.cn: 他们放弃了夺回城堡的努力。

sentences.en: We had to abandon the car and walk the rest of the way.
sentences.cn: 我们只好弃车，步行走完剩下的路。

sentences.en: We will never abandon our principles.
sentences.cn: 我们应该坚持原则.

words.tran_cn: 被抛弃的；无约束的；恣意放荡的；寡廉鲜耻的
抛弃（abandon的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: if someone does something with abandon, they behave in a careless or uncontrolled way, without thinking or caring about what they are doing

trans.tran_cn: 抛弃，舍弃，中止，放弃，放纵
trans.tran_en: to leave someone, especially someone you are responsible for

trans.tran_cn: 离弃，丢弃；遗弃，抛弃；完全放弃
trans.tran_en: to leave someone, especially someone you are responsible for
